slides.title: Ancient India
slides.content:
**Indus Valley Civilization:**
- Period: 3300-1300 BCE
- Cities: Harappa, Mohenjo-daro
- Features: Planned cities, drainage system

**Vedic Period:**
- Early Vedic (1500-1000 BCE)
- Later Vedic (1000-500 BCE)
- Vedas: Rig, Sama, Yajur, Atharva

**Empires:**
- Maurya Empire (322-185 BCE)
- Ashoka the Great
- Gupta Empire (320-550 CE) - Golden Age

slides.title: Medieval India
slides.content:
**Delhi Sultanate (1206-1526):**
- Five dynasties
- Qutub Minar built

**Mughal Empire (1526-1857):**
- Babur: Founder (1526)
- Akbar: Greatest ruler
- Shah Jahan: Taj Mahal
- Aurangzeb: Last great Mughal

slides.title: Freedom Struggle
slides.content:
**Key Events:**
- 1857: First War of Independence
- 1885: Indian National Congress
- 1920-22: Non-Cooperation Movement
- 1930: Salt Satyagraha
- 1942: Quit India Movement
- 1947: Independence (15 August)

**Leaders:**
- Gandhi, Nehru, Patel, Bose, Ambedkar
